item.title: What does ChatGPT think about how AI will impact the Future of Work?
item.description: Everyone talks about ChatGPT and how it is going to change everything. There are thousands of YouTube videos explaining how ChatGPT can be used to generate content, software or do your homework. There are all sorts of clickbait posts alerting on how AI will leave you jobless and without future. If you want to make sense out of the hype, why not asking ChatGPT for help? You can directly ask the famous AI or just read “AI at Work: The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on the Future of Employment.

item.title: What makes humans unique versus machines
item.description: Si hay una actividad que sea humana y difícil de substituir por máquinas es la innovación. Crear algo nuevo requiere de una serie de habilidades que no son fáciles de sustituir por máquinas. Constituyen el Factor Humano que permite entender lo racional y lo irracional de nuestros comportamientos y necesidades, que permite identificar problemas y conectarlos con nuevas formas para resolverlos.
